summary: [bnha Pokemon AU ]Trial of heroes Part 5 Gigantomachia   I was the first day in hoenn. We decidet to walk around the city till a...
caption:
[bnha Pokemon AU ]Trial of heroes
Part 5

Gigantomachia
 
I was the first day in hoenn. We decidet to walk around the city till a giant Tyranitar  like Pokemon appeared. It was big and strong, somehow it looked like a Tyranitar but parts of him looked like Steelix. Together with other trainers we tried to fight it…. I’m not sure why Bakugou’s Rockruff wasn’t able to fight…. 

then after some minutes it dissapeared as quick as it came. What was it? Where did it come from? Not even Officer Jenny had a clue.


it’s a tribut to Kirishima’s past :) 

Follow the tag trialofheroes for more next part hopefulle on monday 29. of april

blog.name: bnhacolorbang
blog.title: Paint Your Canvas
blog.description: A BNHA big bang focused on colors of everyday life and beyond! | FAQ | ABOUT | DISCORD | SCHEDULE |

title: What is this Big Bang?
body:
What exactly is this big bang about? Well, let us inform you! 

This big bang will be dedicated to representing the thoughts, feelings, and relationships of Boku no Hero Academia characters through or with colors! What we mean by this is each pair of artist and writer will be assigned a color depending on both their pick and what the mods deem appropriate. 

This color should be used as the theme for the writers and the main palette for the artists - and this color will also be up for interpretation from both!

For example: if perhaps Person A were to be assigned the color blue, they would create content surrounding that color. They could portray it however they want - maybe they write about the harshness of the dark blue ocean as it brews storms more massive than anything else before, or maybe they could write about the light, lovely blue that reminds them of the sky and the days during summer when they ran under that said sky. 

One person could write about the evils of black, calling it the color of evil and darkness, while another could draw it like a blanket of quiet and the night sky. 

We kept these colors broad for a reason - as such, each pair can paint their own image, even if they got the same color as someone else. 

It all depends on each person, so don’t worry if you share the same color with another pair, you’ll still be creating something unique and what you can call yours!

If you’re interested in this, make sure to take our INTEREST SURVEY!

Good luck!

blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Four Letter Words
description:
by YinYangZodiac

Love is a four letter word.

Fear is a four letter word.

Hate is a four letter word.

Loud is a four letter word.

Pain is a four letter word.

Dead is a four letter word.

Done is a four letter word.

Words: 679, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Hisashi, Bakugou Mitsuki, Bakugou Masaru, Bakugou Katsuki’s Family
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Dead Midoriya Hisashi, Dead Midoriya Inko, Murder, Childhood Trauma, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Implied/Referenced Self-Harm, Implied/Referenced Domestic Violence, Angst with a Happy Ending, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Protective Bakugou Katsuki, Good Parent Bakugou Mitsuki, Good Parent Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Izuku Has PTSD - Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder, Medication, Self-Medication, Marijuana, Sorry Not Sorry, Dead Dove: Do Not Eat, This is heavy, But I regret nothing

blog.name: meloncholor
blog.title: An Idiot
blog.description:
I write 99.99% of my requests.
My ask is ALWAYS OPEN! Red Dead Redemption, My Hero Academia, Castlevania, Dragon Age, occasionally Fire Emblem

title: Kiwa Headcanons (because I love her)
body:
• Kiwa is a daddy’s girl, and her mother is a bit jealous
  • Emi likes to just hug her sometimes and tell her how happy she is that this is her life, she also does this to Shouta
  • Shouta makes most of the food in the house, mostly because if Emi makes anything it WILL be covered in sugar
  • When Kiwa was first born, Shouta would refuse to stop holding her
  • She was so tiny, and Emi didn’t mind that much because she was exhausted
  • Kiwa’s quirk is actually very strong, and the radius of people she can effect grows every year
  • (I may have said this before but her quirk is making people lose their quirks by forcing them to laugh. As in she forces them to laugh and their quirk is erased for a short period of time, based on blood type.)
  • Kiwa doesn’t talk much, but she really likes art and making little sculptures
  • Emi buys her figurines of animals for her birthday every year because she bases her sculptures on them.

  • Emi likes to just hug her sometimes and tell her how happy she is that this is her life, she also does this to Shouta

  • (I may have said this before but her quirk is making people lose their quirks by forcing them to laugh. As in she forces them to laugh and their quirk is erased for a short period of time, based on blood type.)
  • Kiwa doesn’t talk much, but she really likes art and making little sculptures
  • Emi buys her figurines of animals for her birthday every year because she bases her sculptures on them.

tags: please tell me if i did it right or not?
summary: Someone who can read Japanese, please tell me I did it right? I was trying to do Izuku's notebook from BNHA. I can't read...
body: Someone who can read Japanese, please tell me I did it right? I was trying to do Izuku’s notebook from BNHA. I can’t read Japanese, I just copied it from photos… I have no idea what it says, either…

summary: ykno i remember there being a page in the manga where it states that the two dots on ochako's and bakugou's hero uniforms were...
body:
ykno i remember there being a page in the manga where it states that the two dots on ochako’s and bakugou’s hero uniforms were the marks of the hero suit company or artist who made them

……you mean

…….the two dots

LIKE REDESTRO’S MOLES?!??!?

blog.title: Bnha and Naruto blog
blog.description: All the characters included. Also an active Kankuro fan. If you hate Kankuro, then you are not welcomed here. Kidding, this blog is open for everyone, it's just an "underrated characters appreciation blog".

summary: Ok, now I know almost everyone in the BNHA fandom, has compared the character of Shoto Todoroki to Zuko at least once. But,...
body:
Ok, now I know almost everyone in the BNHA fandom, has compared the character of Shoto Todoroki to Zuko at least once. But, can’t we appreciate how much he resembles Gaara from Naruto?

This is Todoroki (I’m sure all of you know him)

And this here is Gaara (of course, who doesn’t know Sabaku no Gaara?)

Look. Let’s start comparing them physichally. These two kids right here, are both redheads (at least part of Shoto’s hair), both have blue eyes (one of Shoto’s eye, the other one is grey I think). And they’re both thin. With the only difference that Shoto is taller than Gaara, and in BNHA Shoto is drawn/represented as one of the most well-built males in his class, while in Naruto, Gaara is extremely thin, despite having spent all of his life, carrying a giant gourd (isn’t that supposed to give you at least some “arm muscles”/biceps, however you wanna call it?).

Now, let’s compare their backstories/childhoods, and their respective families. We know, Shoto was brought to the world, with one sole objective in mind: surpassing All Might. An idea inculcated to him by his own father, the current number 1 hero Endeavour (Enji Todoroki). He had a powerful quirk (ice and fire manipulation), and was trained by his own father to dominate it, from the early days of his childhood. That training, is until now considered abuse, both physichal and psychological. Was even separated from his siblings, and despite being the youngest, he’s also by far, the strongest kid of the Todoroki family. And he was considered a cold and emotionless character, until he fought the main character (Izuku Midoriya, aka Deku), turning into what he’s now.

Now, let’s move to Sabaku no Gaara. Same as Shoto, he was born to accomplish one sole purpose: being jinchuriki to the one-tailed beast Shukaku. He was also separated from his siblings, and wasn’t allowed to play or interact with them. He is also the youngest of his family, and the strongest. None of his siblings can compare to him power-wise. Bear in mind, that his father, same as Shoto’s was an important man in his village. Enji being number 1 hero, and Rasa being the fourth Kazekage. His jutsu “sand manipulation”, is somehow simmilar to Shoto’s ice, and fire bending. And he also was cold, distant (and a “little” sadistic and psychotic. Note my sarcasm), until he fought the main character, who “changed him, and saved his life”.

Now let’s move to their families, and let’s make this quick. Ok, so this is the so-hated asshole, who doesn’t deserve forgiveness: Enji Todoroki.

And this here, is the other idiot, who was not worth being redeemed, Rasa.

Both, are considered abusive in some measure. Both of them are important figures in their own stories. Both of them, almost completely destroyed their children’s lives (thanks Deku and Naruto for saving them). Both of them had older kids (Fuyumi and Natsuo in Enji’s case, and Temari and Kankuro, in Rasa’s) who weren’t fit for the objective, only their respective younger brothers could accomplish. (Yes, Rasa also tried to seal Shukaku in both Temari and Kankuro when they were born, but they weren’t compatible with the beast). And both are equally hated. The only difference is, one of them is dead, and the other alive.

Now, moving to the beloved, supporting siblings. Shoto’s older siblings are, his beautiful sister Fuyumi, and his handsome brother Natsuo.

And we all know Gaara’s hot, badass older sibs: The wind princess Temari, and Sasori’s heir Kankuro.

Now the siblings, also had their childhoods ruined, because of their father’s constant thirst for power. We don’t know much about Fuyumi and Natsuo (not even their quirks are confirmed yet, but it’s speculated they have both inherited their mother’s ice powers). Fuyumi is a teacher, and Natsuo studies medicine. We know they never had the chance to interact with Shoto as kids, and at least Natsuo has proven, to not get along with their father. Also, their mother is in a fricking hospital. Obviously not dead, but unstable. Now moving to the sand kids. Tem and Kank, suffered a lot more. First they lost their mother with Gaara’s birth, and then, they had to spend over a decade of their lives, living under their own brother’s death threats, living in pure terror. They also never played with Gaara. Everytime they approached him, their father would ask them to leave him alone. And came on, their names kinda sound like each other: Te-ma-ri, Fu-yu-mi. Nat-su-o, Kan-Ku-ro. Also, other thing they have in common is, that the girl in both cases is the older child. (Well, we know the Todoroki’s still have Touya, who could be older than Fuyumi, but we still ain’t 100% sure Touya is Dabi, so I’ll leave him out). And the middle child in both cases, is highly overlooked, but extremely attractive (also in both families the middle boy is the tallest kid of the family). You see? Forgot to add, their mutual, never-ending, love and support to their respective younger brothers.

And finally the mothers. We know Rei (Shoto’s mom) was forced to marry Enji against her will, but we know nothing about Karura’s marriage circumstances. We don’t know if she was forced to marry Rasa or not. They’re both mostly absent from their kid’s lives (of course, one of them is dead, and the other in the hospital), and both of them have showed some favouritism towards their younger boys. Now we know, Enji abused Rei, and forced her to have kids with him. Again we don’t know, if Rasa tortured his wife. In fact, it was shown that Rasa actually cried after Karura’s death, on Gaara’s birth day. And after that, he never re-married. So it’s possible that the fourth Kazekage, did actually love his wife, and wasn’t a 100% horrible husband like Enji.

Now, the only differences between Shoto and Gaara are, that Shoto still has both his parents alive, while Gaara’s are dead. And Shoto has 3 confirmed sibs, Gaara has 2. And Shoto wants to be a hero, and Gaara is Kazekage (but even that is a simmilarity: they’re both influential people in their respective stories. Or at least Shoto aims to be one).

Sorry for the long rant, but really, all the things these 2 different characters have in common are incredible.

blog.name: nerdismysafespace-01
blog.title: Finally. My own Nerd Space.
blog.description: I'm tired like all the time now, folks! | multi-fandom nerd space for my art and the posts I like

body: 3 days

reblog.comment: 3 days

trail.content_raw: 3 days

blog.name: obito-is-love
blog.title: Obito Is Love
blog.description: An anime blog solely dedicated to my favorite art form! The majority of my posts are queued so that I don't spam the dashboard, as well as screenshots and music from my favorite osts that I've posted here. I like to capture my favorite moments from every episode I watch, hence the multiple screenshots per post. Apologies in advance for my obsessive tendencies! I tend to marathon shows.

Shihai Kuroiro | 16 |
